mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (seq_board, seq_member, image, name, imageSubject, imageContent, hit, logtime) VALUES (seq_board_id.NEXTVAL, #{seq_member}, #{image}, #{name} ,#{imageSubject}, #{imageContent}, 0, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: select * from board order by seq_board desc
